record.field: Tip: Speed up inventory operations with barcodes

div.b: Speed up inventory operations with barcodes
div.p: Enjoy a quick-paced experience with the Odoo barcode app. It is blazing fast and works even without a stable internet connection. It supports all flows: inventory adjustments, batch picking, moving lots or pallets, low inventory checks, etc. Go to the "Apps" menu to activate the barcode interface.
